plugin_connected: Plugin successfully connected. You can now start sharing notes!
error_uploading_note: There was an error uploading the note, please try again.
parsing_warning: If this message is showing, please do not change to another note as the current note data is still being parsed.
failed_to_parse: Failed to parse current note, check console for details
no_active_file: There is no active file to share
note_shared_clipboard: The note has been shared and the link is copied to your clipboard üìã
cmd_force_upload: Force re-upload of all data for this note
dialog_delete_body: Are you sure you want to delete this NoteLink and the shared link? This will not delete your local note.
settings_server_url_desc: The NoteLink API server URL. Change this if you are self-hosting.
settings_api_key_desc: Click the button to request a new API key
settings_frontmatter_prefix_desc: The frontmatter property for storing the shared link and updated time. A value of `notelink` will create frontmatter fields of `notelink_link` and `notelink_updated`.
settings_theme_desc: To set a new theme, change the theme in Obsidian to your desired theme and then use the `Force re-upload all data` command. You can change your Obsidian theme after that without affecting the theme for your NoteLinks.
settings_light_dark_desc: Choose the mode with which your files will be shared
settings_copy_clipboard: Copy the link to clipboard after sharing
settings_title_source_desc: Select the location to source the published note title. It will default to the note title if nothing is found for the selected option.
settings_title_source_frontmatter_desc: Set the title you want to use in a frontmatter property called `{{field}}`
settings_note_width_desc: The max width for the content of your shared note, accepts any CSS unit. Leave this value empty if you want to use the theme's width.
settings_remove_backlinks_desc: Remove backlinks footer from the NoteLink
settings_remove_custom_desc: Remove elements before sharing by targeting them with CSS selectors. One selector per line.
settings_encrypted_default_desc: If you turn this off, you can enable encryption for individual notes by adding a `share_encrypted` checkbox into a note and ticking it.
settings_expiry_desc: If you want, your notes can auto-delete themselves after a period of time. You can set this as a default for all notes here, or you can set it on a per-note basis.
settings_language_desc: Override the plugin language. By default, the plugin uses Obsidian's language setting.
